description: The principles of mind over matter have been firmly ingrained into your psyche. Activate to produce a crystal necessary for further mental advancement.

spawn_item.message: A dull throb disorients you as something pours forth from your parted lips.

description: A pseudo-enlightenment allowed thee to incompletely advance from Natalist to Solipsist. Activate to produce a crystal necessary for further mental advancement.

spawn_item.message: A dull throb disorients you as something pours forth from your parted lips.

description: A pseudo-enlightenment allowed thee to incompletely advance from Solipsist to Positivist. You now feel slightly sluggish when melee attacking. Activate to produce a crystal necessary for further mental advancement.

spawn_item.message: A dull throb disorients you as something pours forth from your parted lips.

description: A pseudo-enlightenment allowed thee to incompletely advance from Positivist to Absurdist. You now feel highly sluggish when melee attacking. Your social skills have deteriorated significantly. Activate to produce a crystal necessary for further mental advancement.

spawn_item.message: A dull throb disorients you as something pours forth from your parted lips.

description: A pseudo-enlightenment allowed thee to incompletely advance from Absurdist to Abstractionist. You now feel unbearably sluggish when melee attacking. Your social skills have deteriorated even further. You are more vulnerable to physical attacks. Activate to produce a crystal necessary for further mental advancement.

spawn_item.message: A dull throb disorients you as something pours forth from your parted lips.

description: A pseudo-enlightenment allowed thee to incompletely advance from Abstractionist to Idealist. You now feel impossibly sluggish when melee attacking. Your social skills have deteriorated greatly. You are far more vulnerable to physical attacks. Activate to heal rapidly.

transform.msg_transform: Your mind locks in nigh perfect sequence as your flesh follows suit!

description: A pseudo-enlightenment allowed thee to incompletely advance from Abstractionist to Idealist. You now feel impossibly sluggish when melee attacking. Your social skills have deteriorated greatly. You are far more vulnerable to physical attacks. However, every eleven seconds, your physical self slowly restores itself to a perfect condition. Activate to return to normal.

transform.msg_transform: Your strained mind relaxes and your body becomes normal again.

description: A true and pure enlightenment allowed ye to completely advance from Natalist to Perfect Idealist and still retain the Natalist doctrine. You spiritual self is as infinitely close to perfection as possible. Activate to heal your body constantly.

transform.msg_transform: Your mind locks in nigh perfect sequence as your flesh follows suit!

description: A true and pure enlightenment allowed ye to completely advance from Natalist to Perfect Idealist and still retain the Natalist doctrine. You spiritual self is as infinitely close to perfection as possible. Every nine seconds, your physical self swiftly restores itself to a perfect condition. Activate to return to normal.

transform.msg_transform: Your strained mind relaxes and your body becomes normal again.
